Both Luciferian and Jehovian Anunnaki Races, and their Annu- Melchizedek Illuminati descendants seek to claim the Arc of the Cove- nant Gold Box and star gate tools to take control of Earth’s Star Gate- 11, for use in imploding Universal Star Gate-12 during the 2000-2017 BC Stellar Activations Cycle. This plan was known since the success of the 25,500 BC Lucifer Rebellion. • Jesheua and his Universal Templar Security Team intended to use the Arc of the Covenant Gold Box star gate tools (“Rod and Staff”) to release Anunnaki Nibiruian Diodic Crystal Grid Crystal control over Earth’s Templar and Solar Star Gate-4.
